data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Zhaohong, Mound, Laurence A., Tong, Xiaoli (2019): Character state variation within Dendrothrips (Thysanoptera: Thripidae) with a revision of the species from China. Zootaxa 4590 (2): 231-248, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4590.2.2|15 occurrences
